intro_only_event_multi_countdowngift_202:
Whoa! The Masked Royal! What are you
doing here?

Wahaha! I wanted to hang out with my
fans today!

Let’s make some noise, eh? And we can remember
all the fun times we had this year, too!

Prof— I mean, Masked Royal! What’s your favorite
memory of this year?

Hmm... One that stands out is my showdown with
Crasher Wake, but...

What made me the happiest was seeing all the
brilliant smiles of everyone from Alola here
on Pasio!

That’s a good one! Lillie and Hau always look like
they’re having a blast!

Maybe it’s because we’ve made so many new
friends here!
Yeah! I’m sure of it!

Let’s keep challenging ourselves to do all sorts of
things next year!
Maxie!
Hmph. I didn’t expect to run into you here, Archie.

I was just ruminating over the events of the past
year and going through my plans for the future
of my team...
What a coincidence... I was just doing the same!

But I already know what we’ve gotta do! Let’s
finally decide who’s right—Team Aqua or
Team Magma!

Agreed. Then perhaps I should teach you a
lesson right here and now—
No fighting, you two!

Can’t you just get along? We’re supposed to all
be having a good time today!

Maybe instead of fighting, you can spend some
time thanking your team members for all their
help this year!

Listen, scamp. This is between me ’n’ Maxie, and
we’re destined to battle it out...
Perhaps for today, we can call a truce.
What?

It might not be such a bad idea to clear our slates
and restart our battle anew in the new year
after we’ve had time to prepare.
Psh. Fine. You got off easy this time, Maxie.

Next time we battle, we’re deciding this once and
for all!
Time flies so fast, just like a super express train!

I never thought I’d be celebrating the new
year here on Pasio!

So many things zipped by in such a short amount
of time.

I was surprised that you two stars of Nimbasa
City came to Pasio!
I wonder who else we’ll meet here!

But no matter who arrives, there’s really only one
thing on our minds!

Rushing straight to greater heights together with
all the passengers on the Pasio train!
*chuckle* You two are always right on track!

It looks like another year will come to an end
soon, Professor.

Sure does. I’m glad that nothing bad
happened, but...
You’re still worried about Lysandre?

Yeah. For now, it seems like he’s keeping his
promise, though.

I don’t think you have to worry. If anything
happens with him, I’m here to help!
Thanks! I know I can count on you.

But it would’ve been nice to be able to reminisce
together with him, too...

Pasio is a place where different people with
different ways of thinking gather...

And a new year means we’ll get new chances to
meet other people as well!

I’m sure he’ll start to notice just how beautiful the
world can be.
Yeah, I hope so, too.

I was hoping to be the first to give my regards
to the Champion...
*sigh* But I was late to the party.

Weren’t you holding a concert, though? If you
weren’t doing your rocker thing there, I think you
would’ve probably been first.

For singers like me, holding concerts is a way for
me to give back to my fans.

It’s my way of expressing my gratitude for all
their support this year.
Wow... It’s the end of the year already?

I can’t believe that much time has passed since we
first came to Pasio!
You’re only realizing that now?!
Hahaha! It’s just starting to sink in now!

We’ve been battling all sorts of other sync pairs,
and even Hop and Sonia came...

So we haven’t had much time to sit back and
relax, now that I think about it...

Uh...I hate to break up the warm sentiment
you’ve got going here, but...

We’ve still got to show everyone what we’re
really made of! Right, Leon?
Yeah! Let’s keep up the great work, lads!
